title: Building a Scalable Queue System in ElysiaJS with BullMQ
description: Modern web applications often need to handle tasks that shouldn't block the main request-response cycle — sending emails, processing images, generating reports, or syncing data with third-party APIs.

title: Queues Are Not Optional: Scaling Laravel Without Blocking Requests
description: Laravel makes it incredibly easy to build features quickly. But when traffic grows, many Laravel applications start to feel slow, unreliable, or even fragile.

title: PM2 Ecosystem Setup Guide for Node.js/NestJS
description: PM2 is a production-grade process manager for Node.js applications that provides zero-downtime reloads, monitoring, and clustering capabilities.

title: Building a Stateless Laravel Application on AWS (PHP 8.4 & Laravel 12)
description: If your Laravel application runs on a single server, state is simple. Sessions live in files, cache sits in memory, uploads land on disk. Everything works until it doesn't.

title: Laravel Pipeline for Input Sanitization: Safe, Reusable, and Fast
description: A practical guide to what the Laravel Pipeline is, when to use it (and when not), plus a step-by-step build for HTML/script sanitizing user input.

title: Mastering Laravel Nested Controllers
description: Ever struggled to organize deeply related models in Laravel? A practical guide to structuring nested resources in Laravel for real-world project management apps.

title: Stop Passing Arrays: Laravel DTOs for Third-Party API Payloads
description: Replace messy associative arrays with typed DTOs in your Laravel service layer. Cut bugs by 60%, improve testability, and ship cleaner API integrations.

title: Complete Laravel VPS Setup Guide — Ubuntu 24.04 LTS
description: This guide will walk you through setting up a fresh Ubuntu 24.04 LTS VPS for deploying Laravel applications with both staging and production environments.

title: Model Attribute Casting in Laravel: Complete Guide to Accessors and Mutators
description: Laravel's Eloquent ORM provides powerful attribute casting capabilities that allow developers to automatically transform model attributes when retrieving or storing data.

title: Building a Modern Developer Portfolio: A Technical Deep Dive
description: How I designed and built my personal portfolio website using Next.js, TypeScript, and modern web technologies. This is part of a task for end of semester in my campus.
